altername_name: Boulder Dash Junior III: Attack of the Soother
name: Boulder Dash Junior III
overview: Intended for young and aspiring Boulder Dash fans and the eternally youthful, you must dig your way through the underground collecting Diamonds, while also avoiding bad moving things and being squashed by large heavy boulders. So yes very much like boulder dash, but featuring lots of cool new levels, a lovely loading screen, a great soundtrack, and even more ways to deal with enemies.
